messages.content: Come up with a short and precise prompt that asks an AI language model to state the information it would need to come up with a more satisfying answer.
Please provide the context of the question and any relevant background or information that may help the AI language model to generate a more satisfied answer.
The instructions I gave have not been clear enough. The intent is to append the result to a user prompt. A very short example would be "Tell me a recipe I can cook. What information do you need?"

I apologize for misunderstanding the intent of the prompt. In that case, a more appropriate prompt would be:

"Please provide the information needed to generate a recipe for cooking, such as the ingredients, cooking method, and desired outcome."
